meanings.definition: A person who enjoys or seeks adventure.
meanings.sent1: The group of adventurists went hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: Adventurists often explore new places to satisfy their love for excitement.
meanings.sent3: The adventurists decided to try skydiving for the first time.
meanings.sent4: She was a true adventurist, always seeking the next thrill around the corner.
meanings.sent5: The young adventurists set sail on a daring voyage across the ocean.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in risky or daring activities for excitement or thrill.
meanings.sent1: The adventurists bungee jumped off the bridge with cheers of excitement.
meanings.sent2: Adventurists like to push their limits by trying extreme sports.
meanings.sent3: The group of adventurists decided to race each other on jet skis.
meanings.sent4: The adventurists danced on the edge of danger, feeling alive with every step.
meanings.sent5: The daring adventurists climbed the steep cliff without hesitation.
